text: The Ingrate is a 1908 American silent drama movie directed by D. W. GriffithThe IngratePaolo Cherchi Usai. The Griffith Project, Volume 11 and stars Arthur V. Johnson, Florence Lawrence, and George Gebhardt. ==Actors== * Arthur V. Johnson as The Trapper * Florence Lawrence as The Trapper's Wife * George Gebhardt as The Canuck ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1908 drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: The Ingrate
